description: Schema based on rules found in https://www.ebi.ac.uk/vg/faang/rule_sets/FAANG%20Samples.
title: FAANG Schema

___cellCultureProtocol.description: Link to protocol describing how the cells were purified

___pregnancyLength.description: Pregnancy length of time, in days, weeks or months.

___birthDate.description: Birth date, in the format YYYY-MM-DD, or YYYY-MM where only the month is known. For embryo samples record 'not applicable'.

___cultureConditions.description: Brief description of culture conditions (e.g. 'on feeder cells', 'E8 media')

___sex.description: Animal sex, described using any child term of PATO_0000047.

___disease.description: Disease child term of either PATO_0000461 or EFO_0000408

___specimenPictureUrl.description: A link a picture of the specimen, multiple links allowed.

___catalogueNumber.description: Identifier for the cell line in the suppliers catalogue. E.g. 'ACC 701' for IPEC-J2 from DSMZ.

___fastedStatus.description: Fed, fasted or unknown. Criteria for this status must be in your protocol.

___specimenCollectionProtocol.description: A link to the protocol for specimen collection.

___poolCreationProtocol.description: A link to the protocol for pool of specimens creation.

___specimenWeight.description: (Pool) Specimen weight. Total sum if using multiple specimen pieces.

___cultureType.description: Provide a child term of BTO_0000214

___biomaterialProvider.description: Name of company or lab that supplied the cell line

___publication.description: Publication Digitial Object Identifier (DOI) e.g. 'doi://10.1139/o09-005'. Publication where the cell line has been fully described and should include details such as doubling time and adhesion preference. You can use pubmed to find your DOI https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed

___healthStatus.description: Healthy animals should have the term normal, otherwise use the as many disease terms as necessary from EFO.

___placentalWeight.description: Placental weight, in kilograms or grams.

___gestationalAgeAtSampleCollection.description: If the animal was pregnant when the specimen was taken, state how long had been pregnant for

___organismPart.description: Ontology for part of organism specimen from, UBERON is preferred to BTO.

___markers.description: Markers used to isolate and identify the cell type (e.g. for FACS sorted cells).

___breed.description: Animal breed, described using the FAANG breed description guidelines (http://bit.ly/FAANGbreed).

___cellType.description: Provide a cell type from the CL ontology.

___specimenVolume.description: (Pool) Specimen volume. Total sum if using multiple specimen pieces.

___numberOfPassages.description: Number of times the cell line has been re-plated and allowed to grow back to confluency or to some maximum density if using suspension cultures

___cultureProtocol.description: Link to protocol describing the maintenance of the culture

___poolCreationDate.description: Date at which the pool was created.

___material.description: The type of material being described.

___availability.description: Either a link to a web page giving information on sample availability (who to contact and if the sample is available).

___deliveryTiming.description: Was pregancy full-term. early or delayed.

___healthStatusAtCollection.description: Animal disease / health status at point of collection. Healthy animals should have the term normal, otherwise use the as many disease terms as necessary from EFO.

___birthLocationLatitude.description: Latitude of the birth location in decimal degrees.

___specimenCollectionDate.description: Date at which the specimen was collected.

___purificationProtocol.description: Link to protocol describing how the cells were purified.

___developmentalStage.description: Developmental stage, any child term of EFO_0000399.

___birthLocationLongitude.description: Longitude of the birth location in decimal degrees.

___animalAgeAtCollection.description: Animal age at the point of collection. An estimate is acceptable where the age is not precisely known.

___birthWeight.description: Birth weight, in kilograms or grams.

___pedigree.description: A link to pedigree information for the animal

___specimenSize.description: (Pool) Specimen size. Total sum if using multiple specimen pieces.

___description.description: A brief description of the sample including species name.

___nature.description: Nature of the relationship between the samples.

___target.description: Sample accession to which the sample relationship refers to.

___alias.description: A sample unique identifier in a submission.

___taxon.description: The taxonomy name for the sample species.

___taxonId.description: The taxonomy id for the sample species.

___releaseDate.description: Date from which this sample is released publicly.
